posts.title: In the Future We Will All Live in Star Wars
posts.text: The thing you’re doing now, reading prose on a screen, is going out of fashion. The defining narrative of our online moment concerns the decline of text, and the exploding reach and power of audio and video…

posts.title: Rubik’s Cube? No, Robotics and AI are…
posts.text: In other words, I will try to de-hype the crowd about the recent development in robotics. Concretely, OpenAI has claimed some pretty amazing results with learning to solve the Rubik’s cube with a robotic hand…

posts.title: How the Internet of Things will Transfo…
posts.text: The Internet of Things (IoT) promises to be the most important technological development for consumers since the advent of the smartphone. Experts believe that this collection of internet-connected technolog…

steps.title: We’ll prepare a proposal
steps.text: Required scope, timeline and apr. price will be included if you provide us with detail information about a project.

steps.title: Together we discuss it
steps.text: Let’s get acquainted and discuss all the possible variant and options. Google Hangouts or Skype usually works great.

steps.title: Let’s start building
steps.text: When the contract is signed and all goals are set we can start the first sprint.
